metadata.name: Piece of Memory
metadata.description:
Piece of Memory / 2010
3200 * 4000

Wearing a unique creature helmet, this girl is an explorer. She discovers pieces of nature and makes it part of herself. She collects one every day.

Crystal cane, big ears, crown, repair claws, etc.
If you look at it separately, it has a strong personality, but when it is gathered, it blends together.

everyone collect piece of the world through experience. 
These piece become memories, and memories gather and become life.

So even if the various experiences of life don't seem to be related, 
They accumulate and create a single me.

Wouldn't our lives be similar to this girl?

_

It's an 12-year-old sketch.
It is a sketch that allowed me to take a step forward when I was young and worried a lot about drawing.

After the auction, all bidders will be presented with a alliance stamp airdrop.
This stamp will be used as a special ticket in the future. Later announcement.

Thank you for watch!
